settings.description: Personal access token used to authenticate with GitHub. The token can be generated by going to the [Personal Access Token settings page](https://github.com/settings/tokens).
settings.label: Personal Access Tokens
settings.name: access_token

settings.description: Space-separated list of repositories. Each repository must be prefaced by the user/organization name, e.g. `"meltano/meltano meltano/sdk meltano/hub"`
settings.label: Repositories
settings.name: repository

settings.description: Defines how far into the past to pull data for the provided repositories.
settings.label: Start Date
settings.name: start_date
